item.title: Comment on Calculating the distance between two points with the Pythagorean Theorem by Jerry Stajduhar

item.description: Very helpful. Shows exactly how to find the distance between 2 points when you know their coordinates.
item.content:encoded: Very helpful. Shows exactly how to find the distance between 2 points when you know their coordinates.

item.title: Comment on New site additions! by Scratchyone
item.dc:creator: Scratchyone
item.description: Oh! By "Markdown", I meant the way of formatting text, for example **Hello!** is <strong>Hello</strong>. https://help.github.com/articles/markdown-basics/
item.content:encoded: Oh! By “Markdown”, I meant the way of formatting text, for example **Hello!** is Hello. https://help.github.com/articles/markdown-basics/

item.title: Comment on New site additions! by Scratchyone
item.dc:creator: Scratchyone
item.description: Also, I just switched to disqus. I found an XSS vulnerability in wordpresss comments.
item.content:encoded: Also, I just switched to disqus. I found an XSS vulnerability in wordpresss comments.

item.title: Comment on New site additions! by Scratchyone
item.dc:creator: Scratchyone
item.description: I'm using GoDaddy: https://www.godaddy.com/hosting/web-hosting. The cheapest plan is great, and they have amazing support (My site was rmed and they recovered everything). Thanks! To help speed up my site, I am using Google PageSpeed Insights (https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/insights/). It tells what to do to speed up your site. I also do <script ASYNC... in the script tags for things like bootstrap. I'm a little worried that all the code I am injecting might slow it down, though.
item.content:encoded: I’m using GoDaddy: https://www.godaddy.com/hosting/web-hosting. The cheapest plan is great, and they have amazing support (My site was rmed and they recovered everything). Thanks! To help speed up my site, I am using Google PageSpeed Insights (https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/insights/). It tells what to do to speed up your site. I also do <script ASYNC… in the script tags for things like bootstrap. I’m a little worried that all the code I am injecting might slow it down, though.
